sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Add Executive Modal">8b98554b3b523210bc1ccdd643e45a97</macroponent><name>select_1/now_default/items</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function evaluateScript({api}) {
    // Check if the data resource has loaded records
    if (api.data.look_up_records_1.results) {
        // Map the results to the format the select component expects
        return api.data.look_up_records_1.results.map(item => {
            return {
                label: item.name.displayValue, // Use displayValue for the label
                value: item.sys_id.value       // Use sys_id for the value
            };
        });
    }
    return []; // Return an empty array if no data is available yet
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-14 07:25:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>43dd58b73b5e7610bc1ccdd643e45a0a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>select_1/now_default/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_43dd58b73b5e7610bc1ccdd643e45a0a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-14 07:25:46</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
